titleStmt.title: Loves journal a romance, made of the court of Henry the II of France : printed with license at Paris, 1670 / and now made English.
Journal amoureux. English
titleStmt.author: Villedieu, Madame de, d. 1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Ratcliff and Mary Daniel, and are to be sold by the booksellers in London,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
